title: Drawing, ca. 1860
medium: Brush and gouache, pen and black ink over etching on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed:  "bei T.P. Devrient in Berlin C - No. 305."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Abram S. Hewitt
description: Design for wool work.  Scroll design in yellow.  In center a blue box, lighted candle and some playing cards.

exhibitions.title: Hella Jongerius Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection
